description: This header file defines a mock class PersistentStoreImplementationMock used for unit testing, which implements multiple interfaces related to a persistent storage system, including methods for setting, getting, deleting keys/namespaces, and managing cache and limits.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock class for the Persistent Store implementation, simulating interactions with storage interfaces for testing purposes.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a notification callback for store events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a value in the store within a namespace.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value from the store within a namespace.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a key within a namespace.

methods.name: SetValue (IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks setting a value with scope in IStore2.

methods.name: GetValue (IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a scoped value in IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteKey (IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks deleting a scoped key in IStore2.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace (IStore2)
methods.description: Mocks deleting a namespace with scope in IStore2.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope/namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage sizes within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the storage limit of a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting the storage limit of a namespace.
